all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
In the day of their peace they esteemed lightly my counsel; but, in the day of their trouble, of necessity they feel after me.
Doctrine and Covenants 101:8
Quote of the Day
"As disciples of Jesus Christ, we are invited to cultivate the gift of reverence in our lives."
Elder Ulisses Soares | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
